name: Bingo Farm Ways - Bingo Live
description:
Bingo Farm Ways is an addictive bingo game where you can win the most! Compete with players from around the world in a tournament-style game designed like farm and have a lot of fun. The high-quality graphics and animation will make you feel like you’re really there!

Play your way through the game and unlock exciting new episodes. Earn Experience Points (XP) to move up in the tournaments and Win Huge Rewards!
Earn special awards as you complete a new episode. Farm adventures with cute animals are awaiting you.

DOWNLOAD AND PLAY BRAND NEW BINGO NOW!

FEATURES
- Tournament-style play
- High-quality graphics and animation
- Awesome boosters will help you to win back-to-back tournaments
- A lot of amazing episodes to collect
- Tournament-style play
- Live chat with players
- Compete with thousands of people around the globe in real-time multiplayer
- An amazing community
- Collect FREE Gifts and send them to friends!
- Enjoy our daily community Freebies
- Free app updates

PLEASE NOTE! Bingo Farm Ways is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money.
This product is intended for use by those 21 or older for amusement purposes only.
Practice or success at social casino gaming does not imply future success at "real money gambling"

Support
Questions? Contact our tech support at bingofarmways@playcus.com or check our FAQ https://bingo-farm-ways.helpscoutdocs.com

Thanks for playing Bingo Farm Ways!
